sourcesContent:
<template>
  <!-- No changes to template section -->
</template>

<script>
export default {
  name: 'StreamCheck',
  data() {
    return {
      // No changes to data section
    }
  },
  computed: {
    paginatedData() {
      const start = (this.currentPage - 1) * this.pageSize
      const end = start + this.pageSize
      return this.streamList.slice(start, end)
    },
    checkButtonText() {
      if (!this.isChecking && !this.isPaused) {
        return '批量检测'
      }
      return `检测中 ${this.checkedCount}/${this.totalCount}`
    },
    mergedStreams() {
      // No changes to mergedStreams
    }
  },
  created() {
    // No changes to created
  },
  beforeDestroy() {
    // No changes to beforeDestroy
  },
  methods: {
    // No changes to methods
  },
  watch: {
    streamList: {
      handler(newList) {
        this.updateLinkContent()
        this.saveState()
        this.$root.$emit('stream-list-updated', newList.length)
      },
      deep: true
    }
  }
}
</script>

<style scoped>
/* No changes to style section */
</style>
